Get Tidy Parameter from Flexmix Model

Source: R/get_tidy_parameter.R
get_tidy_parameter.Rd

When users derive copy number features, it is useful to know the parameters of the fit components, including mean, sd and coefficient of variation. This function is used by sig_derive function and exported to users for extra usage.

get_tidy_parameter(x)

Arguments

x

a flexmix object or a list of flexmix objects.

Value

a tibble.

Examples

# Load copy number prepare object
load(system.file("extdata", "toy_copynumber_prepare.RData",
  package = "sigminer", mustWork = TRUE
))
# Get all parameters
get_tidy_parameter(cn_prepare$components)
#> # A tibble: 19 x 7
#>    feature     components   dist      mean      sd           cv n_obs
#>    <chr>       <chr>        <chr>    <dbl>   <dbl>        <dbl> <dbl>
#>  1 bp10MB      bp10MB1      pois  3.66e-12 1.91e-6 522870.       2839
#>  2 bp10MB      bp10MB2      pois  9.24e- 1 9.61e-1      1.04      161
#>  3 bpchrarm    bpchrarm1    pois  1.22e- 6 1.11e-3    904.        328
#>  4 bpchrarm    bpchrarm2    pois  1.21e+ 0 1.10e+0      0.909     102
#>  5 bpchrarm    bpchrarm3    pois  5.54e+ 0 2.35e+0      0.425      10
#>  6 changepoint changepoint1 norm  9.01e- 1 7.10e-1      0.787     236
#>  7 changepoint changepoint2 norm  5.83e+ 0 3.40e+0      0.583      11
#>  8 copynumber  copynumber1  norm  1.90e+ 0 5.63e-1      0.296     418
#>  9 copynumber  copynumber2  norm  3.55e+ 0 2.89e+0      0.812      49
#> 10 osCN        osCN1        pois  7.68e- 2 2.77e-1      3.61       62
#> 11 osCN        osCN2        pois  4.55e+ 0 2.13e+0      0.469       5
#> 12 segsize     segsize1     norm  3.19e+ 5 2.09e+5      0.654      60
#> 13 segsize     segsize2     norm  5.53e+ 6 3.95e+6      0.714      79
#> 14 segsize     segsize3     norm  2.39e+ 7 1.06e+7      0.442      95
#> 15 segsize     segsize4     norm  7.00e+ 7 2.36e+7      0.337     121
#> 16 segsize     segsize5     norm  7.07e+ 7 2.37e+7      0.335      25
#> 17 segsize     segsize6     norm  1.34e+ 8 1.16e+6      0.00869    23
#> 18 segsize     segsize7     norm  1.55e+ 8 2.69e+7      0.174      56
#> 19 segsize     segsize8     norm  2.43e+ 8 1.40e+6      0.00576     8
# Get parameters for segsize feature
get_tidy_parameter(cn_prepare$components$segsize)
#> # A tibble: 8 x 5
#>   dist        mean        sd      cv n_obs
#>   <chr>      <dbl>     <dbl>   <dbl> <dbl>
#> 1 norm     318820.   208667. 0.654      60
#> 2 norm    5534293.  3953527. 0.714      79
#> 3 norm   23899505. 10561057. 0.442      95
#> 4 norm   69998482. 23578520. 0.337     121
#> 5 norm   70744732. 23706674. 0.335      25
#> 6 norm  133701749.  1161481. 0.00869    23
#> 7 norm  154983944. 26923555. 0.174      56
#> 8 norm  243283418.  1401122. 0.00576     8
